paragraphs: What a glorious day! As my Prince commanded, I allied myself with the Reachman Durcorach, also known as the Black Drake, and brokered a deal that will see the powerful barbarian crowned emperor and placed upon the Ruby Throne.

Now begins the true work. The endless preparations. The rituals. Everything that must by done to make ready for the Four Ambitions of Mehrunes Dagon. We will perform our tasks and wait for the day when the final part of the arrangement will be carried out and Mehrunes Dagon will claim his due.
All praise the Prince of Destruction! All praise the Prince of Change!
